articles.title: Manchester United takeover: how much Sir Jim Ratcliffe plans to invest after buying 25%
articles.description: The Red Devils have confirmed they have agreed to sell a minority stake in club as INEOS owner takes charge of football operations
articles.content:
Manchester United have agreed to sell a 25% stake in the club to Sir Jim Ratcliffe, the Red Devils announced on Sunday.
The INEOS chairman will invest around £1.3 billion for the minority stake and … [+2634 chars]
